title: Join our team as a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager and help scale performance for our clients.
job_overview:
Join our team as a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager and help scale performance for our clients.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on performance

Key Responsibilities:

Plan, manage, and optimize Google and Meta ads.

Ensure campaigns align with KPIs and client objectives.

Analyze data for continuous performance improvement.

Requirements:

Minimum 1 year experience in digital advertising.

Results-oriented mindset with strong reporting skills.

Remote work readiness.
